item.title: L&G 和 Federated Hermes 合并 47 亿英镑的英国房地产基金
item.description: 英国两家历史最悠久的房地产基金将进行合并，这是该行业遭遇赎回潮后的最新一次整合。【原文：Two of the UK’s longest standing property funds are set to merge, the latest consolidation in a sector that’s been hit with a wave of redemptions.】

item.title: 美蓓亚集团首席执行官宣布结束与雅居乐的芝浦竞购战
item.description: 据美蓓亚三美株式会社首席执行官称，该公司对芝浦电子株式会社的最新收购要约很可能是最后一次，这标志着对这家日本汽车和服务器传感器制造商长达数月的收购战将告一段落。【原文：Minebea Mitsumi Inc.’s latest offer for Shibaura Electronics Co. is likely the final one it will make, according to its chief executive officer, signaling an end to a months-long takeover battle for the Japanese maker of car and server sensors.】

item.title: 泽连斯基与特朗普会晤前欧洲天然气进一步下跌
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普会见乌克兰总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基（Volodymyr Zelenskiy）之前，欧洲天然气价格跌至 2025 年新低。【原文：European natural gas prices fell to a fresh 2025 low ahead of US President Donald Trump’s meeting with Ukraine’s Volodymyr Zelenskiy, who faces pressure to reach a peace deal with Russia that involves ceding territory.】

item.title: 据说 Anker Innovations 考虑在香港上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国电子产品制造商 Anker Innovations Technology Co.【原文：Chinese electronics manufacturer Anker Innovations Technology Co. is considering listing shares in Hong Kong as soon as next year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 利率下降，菲律宾售出 89 亿美元零售债券
item.description: 菲律宾出售了价值 5,072 亿比索（约合 89 亿美元）的零售国债，这主要是由于利率下降，投资者为寻求更高的收益率而需求旺盛。【原文：The Philippines sold 507.2 billion pesos ($8.9 billion) worth of retail treasury bonds, spurred by brisk demand from investors in search of better yields as interest rates fall.】

item.title: Mediobanca 首席执行官面临争取独立的关键投票
item.description: Mediobanca SpA 首席执行官阿尔贝托-纳格尔（Alberto Nagel）为保持银行的独立性而进行的斗争正处于关键时刻。【原文：Mediobanca SpA Chief Executive Officer Alberto Nagel’s struggle to keep the bank independent is set for a critical moment.】

item.title: 英国富时 100 指数直播：投资者等待乌克兰谈判，股市将上涨
MTN 恢复盈利后重整南非管理层
item.description: 作为非洲大陆收入最大的移动电话运营商，MTN 集团有限公司在 2025 年上半年恢复盈利后，对南非管理层进行了改革，以促进增长。【原文：MTN Group Ltd. revamped its South Africa management to spur growth after the continent’s biggest mobile-phone operator by revenue returned to a profit in the first half of 2025.】

item.title: 南非新任首席执行官上任，推动 Absa 实现中期盈利
item.description: 由于削减成本和组织重组为南非第三大银行带来了红利，Absa 集团有限公司上半年利润增长了 14%。【原文：Absa Group Ltd. posted a 14% increase in first-half profit as cost-cutting and an organizational restructure delivered dividends for South Africa’s third-largest bank.】

item.title: 纳瓦罗称印度购买俄罗斯石油是 "机会主义 "行为
item.description: 白宫贸易顾问彼得-纳瓦罗（Peter Navarro）在《金融时报》上写道，自乌克兰入侵以来，印度购买俄罗斯石油的数量急剧增加，这对于全球孤立克里姆林宫、遏制弗拉基米尔-普京的战争机器的努力来说，是 "机会主义和深刻的腐蚀"。【原文：The dramatic increase in India’s buying of Russian oil since the invasion of Ukraine is “opportunistic and deeply corrosive” of a global effort to isolate the Kremlin and curb Vladimir Putin’s war machine, White House trade adviser Peter Navarro wrote in the Financial Times.】

item.title: 交易员获利了结，加密货币从创纪录水平回落
item.description: 在上周创下历史新高后，主要加密货币回落，拖累市场总价值跌破 4 万亿美元。【原文：Major cryptocurrencies retreated to drag the market’s total value below $4 trillion after it scaled record heights last week.】

item.title: 莫迪减税计划抵消贸易紧张局势，印度股市反弹
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）宣布了降低日常用品税收的计划，此举旨在缓解美国可能征收关税的打击并刺激消费，印度股市周一早盘上涨，汽车制造商领涨。【原文：Indian stocks rose in early trading Monday, led by automakers, after Prime Minister Narendra Modi announced plans to lower taxes on everyday goods, a move aimed at cushioning the blow of potential US tariffs and boosting consumption.】

item.title: 据说杰富瑞将任命摩根大通的梅利为亚太区金融机构部主管
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，杰富瑞金融集团（Jefferies Financial Group Inc.【原文：Jefferies Financial Group Inc. has hired Michael Melly from JPMorgan Chase & Co. as Asia-Pacific head of its financial institutions group investment banking franchise, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 东风汽车将出售与本田合资公司 50%的股份
item.description: 中国国有汽车制造商东风汽车集团股份有限公司（Dongfeng Motor Group Co.【原文：State-owned Chinese automaker Dongfeng Motor Group Co. is selling its 50% stake in a joint venture with Honda Motor Co., in a reflection of the country’s rapid shift away from gasoline-powered vehicles.】

item.title: 中国媒体股因电视剧规定可能放宽而大涨
item.description: 有报道称，中国可能放宽对本土电视剧制作的限制，分析师认为这将有利于内容制作商和长视频平台，中国媒体股随之反弹。【原文：Chinese media stocks rallied following reports of a potential easing of restrictions on local drama production, which analysts said would benefit content producers and long-form video platforms.】

item.title: 不管阿拉斯加的游戏是什么，赔率没有变化
item.description:
博彩市场对特朗普与普京的峰会毫无反应。现在轮到欧洲和乌克兰了。【原文：

Betting markets were unfazed by the Trump-Putin summit. It’s Europe and Ukraine’s turn.

】

item.title: 阿波罗的福克斯对冲公司将金融奇才推向新高度
item.description:
私人资本公司正不遗余力地为其受监管的保险公司榨取更多收益。【原文：

Private capital firms are going to remarkable lengths to squeeze out more returns for their regulated insurance companies.

】

item.title: 第一太平戴维斯认为伦敦市中心商铺交易量创七年新高
item.description: 科维德事件后，伦敦最繁华购物区的复兴势头日益强劲，使英国首都的零售地产交易额达到了 2018 年以来的最高水平。【原文：The post-Covid revival of London’s busiest shopping district is gaining momentum, putting the UK capital on course to notch up its highest level of retail property deals by value since 2018.】

item.title: 新西兰将改革同意程序以促进建筑业发展
item.description: 新西兰将对国家建筑审批程序的关键环节进行改革，希望通过改革加快审批速度，消除新建筑的路障。【原文：New Zealand will reform key aspects of the nation’s building approvals process, betting that the changes will speed up consenting and remove roadblocks to new construction.】

item.title: 英国生活水平的压力给斯塔默带来新的危险
item.description: 英国生活水平的复苏即将结束，这对首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）来说是一个潜在的危险时刻，他称赞最近工资增长的强劲势头表明他正在兑现让 "劳动人民 "生活得更好的承诺。【原文：The recovery in UK living standards is coming to an end, a potential moment of peril for Prime Minister Keir Starmer who has hailed the recent strength of wage growth as a sign he is delivering on his pledge to make “working people” better off.】

item.title: 北京为处理赞比亚矿难的中国公司辩护
item.description: 中国政府为一家中国公司处理赞比亚矿难的行为进行了辩护，同时似乎也在美国对这一事件表示关切后对美国进行了抨击。【原文：Beijing defended the actions of a Chinese company over its handling of a disaster at a mine in Zambia, while also appearing to lash out at the US after it raised its concerns about the incident.】

item.title: 尽管经济消息不佳，中国人民银行仍表示不急于降息
item.description: 中国央行表示，尽管中国经济刚刚创下今年迄今为止最糟糕的一个月，但央行仍暂缓通过降息等举措积极放宽货币政策。【原文：China’s central bank indicated it’s holding back from aggressively easing monetary policy with moves such as interest-rate cuts, even though the economy just recorded its worst month so far this year.】

item.title: 减税提振市场情绪，印度股市有望大幅上涨
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 受美国制裁的俄罗斯液化天然气前往亚洲寻找买家
item.description: 几艘液化天然气油轮正从一个受到美国制裁的俄罗斯出口设施驶往亚洲，这有可能考验华盛顿在乌克兰战争问题高级别会谈期间打击天然气贸易的决心。【原文：Several liquefied natural gas tankers are heading to Asia from a Russian export facility sanctioned by the US, potentially testing Washington’s resolve to crack down on the trade amid high-level talks over the war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 自由化努力之后中国资本外流加速
item.description: 在新的市场开放措施出台后，内地投资者积极买入香港资产，推动中国的资本外流在 7 月份创下纪录。【原文：China’s capital outflows hit a record in July, driven by mainland investors’ aggressive buying of Hong Kong assets following new market liberalization measures.】

item.title: 铁矿石走高，因猜测中国钢铁需求可能增加
item.description: 铁矿石在连跌三日后有所上扬，原因是市场猜测中国的钢铁需求可能会季节性反弹，从而刺激需求和价格。【原文：Iron ore edged up after a three-day drop on speculation that steel demand in China may rebound seasonally, aiding demand and prices.】

item.title: 尽管面临关税威胁和不稳定因素，泰国经济增长仍超出预期
item.description: 泰国第二季度的经济增长速度超过预期，因为在美国征收更高的关税之前，出口有所增长，有助于抵消旅游业放缓的影响。【原文：Thailand’s economy expanded faster than expected in the second quarter as exports gained ahead of the imposition of higher US tariffs, helping counter slowing tourism.】

item.title: 交易员等待特朗普与泽伦斯基会晤，基本金属走势低迷
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）与沃洛季米尔-泽连斯基（Volodymyr Zelenskiy）举行紧张会谈之前，金属市场周一开盘谨慎，铝下跌，铜变化不大。【原文：Aluminum fell and copper was little changed as metals markets opened Monday on a cautious note before President Donald Trump’s crunch talks with Volodymyr Zelenskiy.】

item.title: 受储蓄过剩推动，中国股市创十年新高
item.description: 由于与美国的贸易紧张局势有所缓解，资金充裕的本地投资者纷纷涌入股市，上海上市股票将创下十年来的最高收盘价。【原文：A gauge of Shanghai-listed stocks is set for its highest close in a decade, as cash-rich local investors plow into a market that has surged amid easing trade tensions with the US.】

item.title: 玻利维亚社会主义时代结束，亲商候选人获胜
item.description: 选民们将两位亲商界的候选人送入玻利维亚总统选举的决选，结束了玻利维亚长达二十年几乎不间断的社会主义统治，并可能改变该国的经济模式及其与华盛顿的关系。【原文：Voters sent two pro-business candidates to Bolivia’s presidential election runoff, ending two decades of almost-uninterrupted socialist rule and likely transforming both the nation’s economic model and its relations with Washington.】
